--- layout: component title: Navbar description: 'The Navbar component is a global navigation pattern that allows the user to explore the top-level sections or pages of the site. For Apollo this appears as a blue bar at the top of the page with three main components:
  1. A logo mark that identifies the branded tool and functions as a link to the default page (usually a home page of some kind)
  2. A series of links to the primary sections of the product with optional cascading sub-links to sub-sections on click
  3. A login control that either provides feedback to identify the user or provides the option to login
' guidelines: do: - Use as the primary navigation control for a product or site dont: - Use on any kind of sub-UI like a Modal, Dialog, or Card - Use on a Table or List View contents: - Usage guidelines - Basic navbar - Command bar ---
